properties.entry: SELECT RNUM , CER_ID , CER_PIC , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_NO , CHALL_CONFIRM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, CERLIST.* FROM(SELECT CER_ID , CER_PIC , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_NO , C.USER_ID , CER_STATUS , CHALL_CONFIRM FROM CER C JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CER_STATUS != 'Y' AND C.USER_ID = ? AND CHALL_NO = ? ORDER BY CER_DATE DESC)CERLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO CER ( CER_ID , CER_PIC , CER_COMMENT , CER_DATE , USER_ID , CHALL_NO , CER_STATUS
) VALUES ( SEQ_PID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , 'N' )

SELECT RNUM , CER_ID , CER_PIC , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_NO , CHALL_CONFIRM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, CERLIST.* FROM(SELECT CER_ID , CER_PIC , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_NO , C.USER_ID , CER_STATUS , CHALL_CONFIRM FROM CER C JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CER_STATUS != 'Y' AND CHALL_NO = ? ORDER BY CER_DATE DESC)CERLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT CER_ID , CER_PIC , CER_COMMENT , CER_DATE , C.USER_ID , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_NO FROM CER C JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CER_ID = ? AND CER_STATUS != 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CER WHERE CHALL_NO = ? AND USER_ID = ? AND CER_STATUS != 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CER WHERE CHALL_NO = ? AND CER_STATUS != 'Y'
UPDATE CER SET CER_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE CER_ID = ?
UPDATE CER SET CER_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE CER_ID = ?

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CER_DATE), CHALL_COUNT, COUNT(DISTINCT CER_DATE)/CHALL_COUNT AS 달성률 FROM CER JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CER.USER_ID = ? AND CHALL_NO = ? AND CER_STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY CHALL_COUNT
